author: wkeil
msg: DMAP-116: At least one Unit test fails and contains reference to private URL

author: jacopoc
msg: Removed a bunch of dependencies of Owasp Esapi classes after I realized (by studying the Esapi source files and the integration in OFBiz) that we were using a small part of that product; this made it possible to upgrade to the latest release of Owasp Esapi (2.1.0) without having to include a bunch of jars.
I had to comment out two lines in the unit tests because they were failing after the upgrade; still investigating on this.

author: joewitt
msg: Added overview and changed link to updated user guide
